title: Hakata Tonkotsu Ramens – Extra Games - Novel Updates
author: Chiaki Kisaki   木崎ちあき
description:
A side story to Hakata Tonkotsu Ramens.

A collection of short stories across the whole timeline. Each chapter is an individual story and can be read separately.

 **Timeline of the short stories are as follows:
Ch. 1 - between volumes 1 and 2
Ch. 2 - prequel (mentions of volume 6)
Ch. 3 - post-volume 8
Ch. 4 - post-volume 8
Ch. 5 - around volume 3>
